data.text: @IsaCNN Hello Isa, in order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.

@JohanMuijres @johanmuijres Hello Johan, we apologize for the inconvenience. The situation is being verified and, as previously informed, as soon as there is additional information on your luggage you will be contacted. 
Thank you.
@Maria_LSantaM @maria_lsantam Hello María, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.
@antolamador Hello Antonio, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@antolamador Hello Antonio, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@gustavoassis Olá,
Respondemos por DM.
@jemchappers @jemchappers Hello Julia, we replied by direct message. Thank you.
@RubenRCarlos Olá Ruben, lamentamos os transtornos causados. Respondemos por mensagem direta. Obrigado.

@denisegtelli @denisegtelli  Olá Denise, lamentamos os transtornos causados pela situação descrita. Caso ainda possamos ser úteis com alguma questão por esta via, pedimos que nos indique o código de reserva por mensagem direta.
Obrigada.
@KristiarneL @kristiarnel Hello, we replied your direct message. Thank you.

@iItsGAL @iitsgal Olá, lamentamos os transtornos causados. Pode indicar-nos o código de reserva? Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem direta.
Obrigada.

@MlleGautier @mllegautier Hola,
Puede decirnos el código de reserva? Por razones de seguridad sugerimos enviar por mensaje directo. Gracias.
@risquete @risquete Hola Jaume, hemos contestado a sus mensajes directos. Gracias.

@hannahmc38 Hello Hannah,
We are very sorry about this situation and apologize for any inconvenience.
In order to verify your case, please let us know your lost baggage claim number (PIR). We recommend that you do so by private message due to confidentiality reasons.
Thank you
@YoreimaM @luischicott Gracias por su comentario ✈️

@GriffinOrla Hello pomac,
we apologise for the time taken on your process. You will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@Ri_Ma_9 Hello Boh?,
We hereby inform that the email is correct. You may submit your claim through the following link:
✈️ https://t.co/sjwAICeOkJ
Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@Lientjeke Hello Lien,
we are verifying the situation and you will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@evydemment Hello Evy,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@DaniloFSLS please provide us the ticket number via DM. Thank you.

@Elyade7 Bonsoir Boy,
Une réponse vous a été apportée en message privé. 
N'hésitez pas à revenir vers nous, si besoin.
Merci.

@angelarutledge Hello angelarutledge,
we are verifying the situation and will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.

@blastKiteboard2 Hello blast,
we are verifying the situation and will get back as soon as possible. Thank you.

@DaniloFSLS Hello Danilo,
how can we help you through this channel? Thank you.
Hello Danilo, how can we help you through this channel? Thank you.

@jonthanbradford Hello Johny,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.

@diosadeamourr Hello champagnemami,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.

@RateMyCRM Hello Nicolaus,
if you still need our assistance, please provide us the booking reference via DM. Thank you.

@dycampelo Olá Pequena,
responderemos a sua mensagem privada o mais breve possível. Obrigado.

@PabloDazan Hello Pablo,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.

@VictorLeopold Olá Victor,
Lamentamos a situação reportada e todos os transtornos causados.
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o código da reserva ou número de bilhete (047-XXXXXXXXXX).   
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por DM.   
Obrigado.

@aliciaspb Olá Alicia,
pedimos que nos indique o código da reserva em questão para que possamos verificar. Obrigado.
@noebomm Disponga 😄

@misterberlanga Hola Mister,
Para que nos sea posible verificar su cuestión, le pedimos que nos indique su código de reserva. Gracias

@madeg1957 Hola Marlene,
Estamos disponibles por este medio. Como podemos ayudarle? Gracias

@noebomm Hola,
Lamentamos el retraso y informamos que hemos ya encaminado las informaciones por mensaje privado. Gracias

@HeuraVidal Hola Heura,
Como indicado, tiene que aguardar. Gracias

@YoreimaM @luischicott Hola Yoreima,
Lamentamos que nuestro servicio no tenga sido de acuerdo con sus expectativas. Si tiene alguna cuestión que necesite de nuestra asistencia, le rogamos que nos indique. Gracias

@Janina8927 Hello Janina,
please provide us the claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@Partysaurus_si Hello Simon,
if you still need our assistance, please provide us the booking reference via DM. Thank you.

@jovanovska__ @WebSummit @bookingcom Hello Jovana,
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to softwares, apps, communication equipments, hardwares

domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@latorredajulia Olá Julia,
lamentamos a resposta tardia e o inconveniente causado. Verificamos que contactou o nosso Contact Center e que o voo partira às 18:38. Estamos ao seu dispor para esclarecimentos adicionais. Obrigado.
@Agnes5253 Hello Agnes, we truly apologise for the late reply and the time taken on the process. We are verifying the situation. The refund will be processed as soon as possible. Thank you.

It's always sunny somewhere. ☀️
Brazilian destinations are here to warm you up with their rich culture, smiles and breathtaking landscapes. 🇧🇷✈️
Enjoy the best prices for Brazil! Book now at https://t.co/ihLfQ3UA9Q. https://t.co/6y2xIh4En8

urls.title: Find Cheap Flights and Deals: Compare & Book | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Find cheap flights to 80+ destinations in Europe, Africa and the Americas. Compare great offers on Tap flights and enjoy flying with a premiere airline.

data.text:
@mrgodive Hello Mark,
We answered per DM.
@starflyergold Bearing this in mind, we kindly inform you that your comments have been taken into full consideration. Thank you for your input. 2/2

@starflyergold Hello, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. Our passengers' opinions are very important to us, since they allow us to assess the quality of our services and work on their improvement. 1/2

@vanessacomdr @vanessacomdr Olá dra. vanessa, pode indicar-nos o seu número TAP Miles&Go por forma a verificar? Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada. 
Obrigada.

@lonekayak @lonekayak Hello Patrick, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Can you provide us with your booking code in order to verify?
For security reasons we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@kissmyhamas Hello Bellatrix, in order to verify we kindly ask you to provide us the bookings reference or the ticket number. For confidential reasons we suggest you to send us those details by private message. Thank you.
@Lozza_T_90 Hello Lauren, in order to verify, please provide us the travel date and the itinerary. For confidential reasons we suggest you to send us those details by private message. Thank you.

@jemchappers Hello Julia, in order to verify we kindly ask you to provide us the bookings reference or the ticket number. For confidential reasons we suggest you to send us those details by private message. Thank you.
@lafillequidanse Hello Kezia, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@mi57598529 We always try to offer the best possible service to our passengers, specially when unexpected irregularities happen, and we sincerely regret that you feel that the support provided has not been as expected. Thank you.  2/2
@mi57598529 Hello Smith, we sincerely apologize for the situation described and for all the distress and inconvenience it may have caused. 1/2

@parisaveclauren Hello Lauren,
We answered per DM.

@JohanMuijres @johanmuijres Hello Johan, we replied to your direct messages. 
Thank you.

@5sixcreate Qualquer outra questão/situação em que possamos ajudar através deste canal, por favor indique-nos.
Obrigada.  (3/3)

@5sixcreate A TAP está a reunir todos os esforços para evitar este tipo de situações pois oferecer um serviço de excelência a todos os passageiros foi, é e sempre será o lema da nossa companhia. (2/3)

@5sixcreate Olá 5six,
lamentamos, desde já, que o nosso serviço não tenha ido ao encontro das suas expetativas e agradecemos, de igual forma, o seu feedback. (1/3)

@PuiggariClara @TAPAirP_DontFly Hola Clara,
lamentamos leer lo que nos comenta.
Hemos respondido a su mensaje privado.
Gracias.

@Diaz_Ibe Hello,
We answered per DM.
@astierclaire Par raisons de confidentialité, nous vous suggérons d'envoyer ces informations par message privé. Merci. (2/2)

@Nick_Eq Hello Nick, in order to verify we kindly ask you to provide us the bookings reference or the ticket number. For confidential reasons we suggest you to send us those details by private message. Thank you.
@polecatcaz Hello Caroline, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@Djego79911530 @djego79911530 Hello Djego, we replied by direct message. Thank you.

@MaevaGaye Bonjour Adja,
toutes nos excuses pour l'attente.
Nous avons répondu à votre message privé.
Merci.

@SCMontiel Olá,
Respondemos por menagem privada.
@NicoleWells006 Hello Nicole, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@visionstorm_net For confidential reasons we suggest you to send us those details by private message. Thank you. 2/2

@visionstorm_net Hello visionstorm, we apologise for the late reply and for the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify we kindly ask you to provide us the bookings reference or the ticket number. 1/2
